remarks: The sum of a real number modulo a positive real number and another real number equals the sum of the two real numbers modulo the positive real number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-May-2018.)
statement: modaddmod $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + B ) mod M ) = ( ( A + B ) mod M ) ) $.
